Class StarDust

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.StarDust
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StarDust extends AdventureCard
Represents a StarDust adventure card.

This card introduces a space event where players must handle an encounter with star dust. The specific effects and interactions of the card are defined by its corresponding StarDustState.

The card follows the standard lifecycle of an AdventureCard: it provides an initial state for state transitions, can print itself to the CLI, and communicates a hint message to the client-side UI.

      public void getHintMessage(AdventurePhaseData adventurePhaseData)
